description: Detects creation of Microsoft Office files inside of one of the default startup folders in order to achieve persistence.
author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Loading a user environment from a backup or a domain controller
name: Potential Persistence Via Microsoft Office Startup Folder
query: ((((((file.path:/.*\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\\\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/) OR ((file.path:/.*\\\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/))) AND file.path:(/.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Xx]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Tt]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Tt][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Tt][Ff]/))) OR ((((file.path:/.*\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\\\[Xx][Ll][Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt].*/) OR ((file.path:/.*\\\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Xx][Ll][Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt].*/))) AND file.path:(/.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Xx]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Tt]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Tt][Mm]/)))) AND (NOT process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))
